'William Peter Moseley' England & Wales, Birth Index: 1984-2005, as accessed
on [http://www.ancestry.co.uk Ancestry.co.uk]. (born 27 April 1987) is an
English actor, currently best known for appearing as Peter Pevensie in the film
series ''The Chronicles of Narnia''. Previously, he had a small role as
Forrester in a 2002 adaptation of the novel [[Goodbye Mr. Chips]], and appeared
as an extra in [[Cider with Rosie]] (1998).
